law.catch_line: An inmate may be placed in the program if:...
law.text:
An inmate may be placed in the program if:
the inmate agrees to waive the inmate's right to contest extradition;
the Commissioner or the Commissioner's designee approves the placement; and
the inmate has served any statutorily imposed minimum sentence, less the allowances for diminution of the inmate's term of confinement provided under Subtitle 7 of this title and § 6-218 of the Criminal Procedure Article.
